Stats module¶

Contents

  • Stats module

ImageStats class¶

class iris.stats.ImageStats(image_path, force_refresh=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: orb.core.Tools

Compute quality parameters of a SITELLE image.

Computed parameters are: FWHM of both cameras, sky background, extinction, shift along X and Y axis in both cameras.

__init__(image_path, force_refresh=False, **kwargs)¶

Init class.

Note

Initialization steps:

  1. (reference image) Compute alignment parameters between CAM1 and CAM2
  2. Create a merged frame equal to CAM1 + CAM2
Parameters:
  • image_path – Path to a SITELLE raw image.
  • force_refresh – (Optional) If True the given image is considered to be a reference image ad all previous files are erased (default False).
  • kwargs – Keyword arguments of orb.core.Tools class (see ORB documentation).
_get_frame_group()¶

Return a hdf5 group of the frame based on its odometer number.

_get_hdr_keyword(key)¶

Return the value of a keyword in the header of the image.

_get_reference_file_path()¶

Return the reference file path.

_get_stars_params_group(camera, ref=False)¶

Return the hdf5 group of a set of stars parameters given the camera number.

Parameters:
  • camera – Camera number, can be 0, 1 or 2.
  • ref – (Optional) If True, image is a reference image (default False).
compute_stats()¶

Compute stats of the image for both cameras.

get_stats()¶

Return the computed stats in a nice human readable form as a dict.

ReferenceFile class¶

class iris.stats.ReferenceFile(file_path, refresh=False, **kwargs)¶

Bases: orb.core.Tools

Manage the reference file

__init__(file_path, refresh=False, **kwargs)¶

Init class.

Parameters:
  • file_path – Path to the reference file
  • refresh – (Optional) If True, previous reference file is erased (default False).
  • kwargs – kwargs of orb.core.Tools (see ORB documentation).
add_attribute(dataset, attr, value)¶

Add an attibute to a dataset

Parameters:
  • dataset – Dataset path
  • attr – Attribute name
  • value – Value of the attribute.
append(dataset, arr)¶

Append a new dataset to the reference file.

Parameters:
  • dataset – Dataset path
  • arr – Array to append.
get(dataset, no_error=True)¶

get data of a given dataset.

Parameters:
  • dataset – Dataset path.
  • no_error – (Optional) If True and if the dataset does not exist a vaule of None is returned with no error raised (default True).
get_attributes(dataset)¶

Return all the attributes of a dataset as a list of tuples.

Parameters:dataset – Dataset path.
